channel.title: 🏢 Rutgers University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Rutgers University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Estimating Generalization Performance Along the Trajectory of Proximal SGD in Robust Regression
item.description: New consistent estimators precisely track generalization error during robust regression’s iterative model training, enabling optimal stopping iteration for minimized error.
